### 0.5 Locate your outcome

### 1. Upload the outcome

![Starting image: click on 'Outcomes' in the left hand mneu](./images/canvas_outcome_upload_start.png)

Click 'import' on the top menu.

![Upload popup](./images/canvas_outcome_upload.png)
Click anywhere to open the file chooser.

![Mac file chooser, yours may look different](./images/canvas_outcome_choose_file.png)
Choose the CSV file corresponding to the outcome we're assessing this year. Once the file is uploaded, you'll see a 'processing' page for a moment.

![Outcome upload complete](./images/canvas_upload_wait.png)


When complete, it should show:

![Outcome upload complete](./images/canvas_outcome_complete.png)

### 2. Extract the rubric

Navigate to the 'Rubrics' section using the left-hand menu.

![Outcome upload complete](./images/canvas_goto_rubric.png)

![Outcome upload complete](./images/canvas_rubric_create.png)


![Choose 'find outcome'](./images/canvas_rubric_find_outcome.png)
Click on 'Find Outcome'

![Choose the outcome you uploaded previoously](./images/canvas_rubric_choose_outcome.png)

![Note the importance of this checkbox](./images/canvas_rubric_note.png)

See Enabling Learning Mastery Gradebook.
